verses.verse: When <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it <S%H2895>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he did not <S%H1980>go<s%> as at <S%H6471>other<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> to <S%H7122>seek<s%> <S%H5173>omens<s%> but he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>camping<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> by <S%H7626>tribe;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> upon him.

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> And the <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H8365>opened;<s%>

The <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of him who <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>Falling<s%> <S%H5307>down,<s%> yet having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H2895>fair<s%> are your <S%H168>tents,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> Your <S%H4908>dwellings,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>

"Like <S%H5158>valleys<s%> that <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out, Like <S%H1593>gardens<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> Like <S%H174>aloes<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Like <S%H730>cedars<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

<S%H4325>"Water<s%> shall <S%H5140>flow<s%> from his <S%H1805>buckets,<s%> And his <S%H2233>seed<s%> [shall be] by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> And his <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H7311>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H90>Agag,<s%> And his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted.<s%>

<S%H410>"God<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> him out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> He is for him like the <S%H8443>horns<s%> of the <S%H7214>wild<s%> <S%H7214>ox.<s%> He shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> [who are] his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> And shall <S%H1633>crush<s%> their <S%H6106>bones<s%> in pieces, And <S%H4272>shatter<s%> [them] with his <S%H2671>arrows.<s%>

"He <S%H3766>couches,<s%> he <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> as a <S%H738>lion,<s%> And as a <S%H3833>lion,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> dares <S%H6965>rouse<s%> him? <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is everyone who <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you, And <S%H779>cursed<s%> is everyone who <S%H779>curses<s%> you."

Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H5606>struck<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5606>together;<s%> and Balak <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> "I <S%H7121>called<s%> you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H340>enemies,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have <S%H1288>persisted<s%> in <S%H1288>blessing<s%> them <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times!<s%>

"Therefore, <S%H1272>flee<s%> to your <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6258>now.<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> I would <S%H3513>honor<s%> you <S%H3513>greatly,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4513>held<s%> you <S%H4513>back<s%> from <S%H9202>honor.<s%>"
And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> "Did I not <S%H1696>tell<s%> your <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518>'Though<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> were to <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> I <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>do<s%> anything <S%H5674>contrary<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> either <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad,<s%> of my own <S%H3820>accord.<s%> <S%H834>What<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speaks,<s%> that I will <S%H1696>speak<s%>'?

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H1980>going<s%> to my <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> [and] I will <S%H3289>advise<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H319>come.<s%>"

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> And the <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H8365>opened,<s%>

The <S%H5002>oracle<s%> of him who <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> And <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High,<s%> Who <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>Falling<s%> <S%H5307>down,<s%> yet having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered.<s%>

"I <S%H7200>see<s%> him, but not <S%H6258>now;<s%> I <S%H7789>behold<s%> him, but not <S%H7138>near;<s%> A <S%H3556>star<s%> shall <S%H1869>come<s%> forth from <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And a <S%H7626>scepter<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> And shall <S%H4272>crush<s%> <S%H4272>through<s%> the <S%H6285>forehead<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> And <S%H9532>tear<s%> <S%H9532>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8352>Sheth.<s%>

"And <S%H9000>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H3423>possession,<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> its <S%H340>enemies,<s%> also shall be a <S%H3423>possession,<s%> While <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>performs<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
"One from <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7287>have<s%> <S%H7287>dominion,<s%> And shall destroy the <S%H6>remnant<s%> from the <S%H8300>city.<s%>"

And he <S%H7200>looked<s%> at <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6002>"Amalek<s%> was the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> But his <S%H319>end<s%> [shall be] destruction."

And he <S%H7200>looked<s%> at the <S%H7017>Kenite,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>place<s%> is <S%H386>enduring,<s%> And your <S%H7064>nest<s%> is <S%H7760>set<s%> in the <S%H5553>cliff.<s%>
<S%H3588>"Nevertheless<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H9515>Kain<s%> shall be <S%H1197>consumed;<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall <S%H804>Asshur<s%> <S%H7617>keep<s%> you <S%H7628>captive<s%>?"
And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>discourse<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>"Alas,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H2421>live<s%> except <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H7760>ordained<s%> it?

"But <S%H6716>ships<s%> [shall come] from the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim,<s%> And they shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H804>Asshur<s%> and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H5677>Eber;<s%> So they <S%H1571>also<s%> [shall come] to destruction."

Then <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>departed<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
